name: FLAMBERGE
description: Flamberge is a tactics RPG featuring free movement and simultaneous turns. Players plan out their moves ahead of time, then during execution, both allies and enemies will act at the same time.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or higher Processor: Intel Pentium IV @ 2 Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB graphics or higher Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP or higher Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 2.5 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel 4600 HD+ or higher Storage: 500 MB available space
